column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Now for the ramen...I had the tonkotsu black sub thick noodles. It had a taste that I wasn't expecting. After much thought
column2: I realized it was the seaweed that gave it a bitter flavor. I took it out
column3: and could then taste the creaminess I was looking for. I would have preferred they cut the egg in half. Even though it was called a seasoned egg
column4: I didn't notice much flavor which was a bit disappointing.
